overview: When Alektra stumbles upon a secret glory hole in a competitors bathroom, she decides to turn her boutique into a fantasy glory hole business. Her trusty assistant helps spread the word and soon business is booming, providing discerning women with a unique sexual experience. But things get complicated when Alektras boyfriend shows up to apply for a position. Will this be the end of their relationship? Or the beginning of an entirely new one? Pick your pleasure.
title: The Sex Boutique: Glory Holes
